title: Natural Gas: What Confirms An Eruptive Move Before September 20th, 2019?
text:
On analysis of the movements of futures, in different time frames, I find that the Natural Gas futures look ready for an eruptive move before September 20th, 2019. Natural Gas futures have not only successfully come above the Ichimoku clouds, but also sustaining above the 200 DMA in a daily chart; which confirms the advent of an eruptive move before September 20th, 2019.

Finally, I conclude that the next steep upward move on September 17-18 above the level of $2.888 will confirm the advent of an eruptive move; which will result in short-covering rally in futures. Secondly, the costlier crude will enhance the demand for Natural Gas; which confirms the an immediate reversal in Natural Gas futures.
